general.unrelatedDataText: It is very unusual that fingerprints are used for advertising purposes.
general.bioDataText: Fingerprints are particularly sensitive, since they facilitate identity theft. It is recommended to only provide consent for fingerprint data where absolutely necessary.

descriptions.dpv:location: Location data is data that tells us where you have been at what time. We collect location data via GPS if you give permission in our ${we} mobile application. We use your location data to customize our advertising, to plan our marketing geographically, and to prevent fraud via geographic identity verification.
descriptions.dpv:name: We collect your name to properly address you. We store your name from your profile.
descriptions.dpv:fingerprint: Fingerprints are used to verify your credentials and prevent identity theft.
descriptions.dpv:marketing: Marketing is essential for us, as we are active in very different markets. We recognize regional preferences and can thus adapt our products for you as a customer.
descriptions.dpv:advertising: Advertising is an integral part of our business model, which guarantees that we can continue to provide you with our restaurant recommendations.
descriptions.dpv:identity-verification: Identity verification is a security process where we ensure that you are a real person and not a bot. We also use identity verification to prevent fraud, such as identity theft or data theft. Furthermore, we make sure that you are older than 16 years old.

msg.please-complete-the-consent-guide: You have not yet answered all questions. Please answer all questions to complete the questionnaire.

placeholder.search-for-a-question-or-an-answer: Search for a question or an answer

qna.introduction: Find out more about the TRAPEZE privacy dashboard and its underlying concepts. Do not forget to let us (${we}) know if you cannot find information you are interested in.

home.title: Welcome to your personal privacy dashboard!
home.welcome-msg1:
We at ${we} want you to understand how we process your personal data. Therefore, we use the TRAPEZE Privacy Dashboard, which helps us to grant you your rights as a data subject. You can learn more about TRAPEZE in our FAQ section or by visiting the TRAPEZE website. 
 
 In this dashboard, you can view what personal data we (${we}) process and for which purposes. When you registered for our service, you consented to our privacy policy. This dashboard allows you to configure your consent on a fine-grained level.
home.welcome-msg2: You can give or revoke your consent based on the following:
home.welcome-msg3: We recommend using the 'Consent Assistant' to express your preferences and match them against your consent decisions.

0.name: Types of data we process like location, name, or biometric information.

1.name: Purposes for which we process data like advertising, marketing, or identity verification.

0.title: Data
0.content: Tell us (${we}) which of your data we may use.

1.title: Purposes
1.content: Tell us (${we}) what we may use your data for.

2.title: Consent
2.content: View the consent you gave us (${we}).

3.title: TRAPEZE
3.content: Learn more about the TRAPEZE project of the European Union.

consent.title: Consent
consent.text: Location data is data that tells us where you have been at what time. We collect location data via GPS if you give permission in our ${we} mobile application. We use your location data to customize our advertising, to plan our marketing geographically, and to prevent fraud via geographic identity verification.
consent.text_ad: Advertising is an integral part of our business model, which guarantees that we can continue to provide you with our restaurant recommendations. We use the below data categories to customize advertising. Tell us below which data categories we may use to customize our advertising.
consent.name: Name
consent.sensitivityText: You can configure how sensitive this data is to you. We treat very sensitive data differently and with extensive care
consent.sensitivityHeader: How sensitive is this data to you?

PAlertLeaveDialog.dialog-title: Are you sure you want to leave this page?
PAlertLeaveDialog.lose-changes-warning: You need to submit your choices.
PAlertLeaveDialog.lose-consent-helper-choices: You haven't addressed all warnings yet.

consent.desc: Configure which data categories we're allowed to use for which purposes ('Data Category' tab). Or for which purposes we're allowed to use which data ('Purpose' tab). The tab 'Privacy Policy' lets you review all versions of our privacy policy.
consent.title: Consent Assistant
consent.text: Location data is data that tells us where you have been at what time. We collect location data via GPS if you give permission in our ${we} mobile application. We use your location data to customize our advertising, to plan our marketing geographically, and to prevent fraud via geographic identity verification.
consent.text_ad: Advertising is an integral part of our business model, which guarantees that we can continue to provide you with our restaurant recommendations free of charge. We use the below data categories to customize advertising. Tell us below which data categories we may use to customize our advertising.
consent.name: Name
consent.sensitivityText: You can configure how sensitive this data is to you. We treat very sensitive data differently and with extensive care
consent.sensitivityHeader: How sensitive is this data to you?
consent.warning-msg-not-comfortable: In the Consent Assistant, you have indicated that you are uncomfortable that we (${we}) use your ${dataCategory} data for ${purpose} purposes. However, the consent you gave us indicates that you are comfortable. Please review your consent.
consent.warning-msg-no-opinion: In the Consent Assistant, you have indicated that you do not have an opinion on our (${we}) processing of your ${dataCategory} data for ${purpose} purposes. However, the consent you gave us indicates that you are comfortable. Please review your consent.

help.desc: By offering this short survey, we want to ensure that we only collect and use your data in a way you are comfortable with. By completing this questionnaire, you can tell us how you like us to treat your data. Your answers are matched against your current consent decision. Afterward, you're provided with guidance on how to adjust your consent so that it fits with your preferences.
help.comfort: How comfortable are you that we use this type of data for the following purposes?
